original_text: The Lord will accept the gifts that the people of Judah and Jerusalem offer to him. He will be happy with them as he was in earlier times.
korean_text: 그 때에 유다와 예루살렘의 봉헌물이 옛날과 고대와 같이 나 여호와께 기쁨이 되려니와

sentences.original_text: The Lord will accept the gifts
that the people of Judah and Jerusalem offer to him
He will be happy with them
as he was in earlier times
